h3.div: Grab and Go Meals for Breakfast and Lunch will be free for ages 1-18 and $6.00 for adults. The meals will be available Monday-Friday in front of the Richfield School from 10am -11am. Delivery is also available to regular bus routes. Contact your regular bus driver for delivery.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: A Huge Thank You to the Richfield Community for your support on our recent Supplemental Levy, it is greatly appreciated by students, staff, administration and school trustees of the Richfield School District.
